sentences.sContent: So why are so many people hoping to be its receptionist?
sentences.sContent_eng: So why are so many people hoping to be its receptionist?
sentences.sCn: 那么，为何会有如此多的人想去当它的接待员呢？ ？

sentences.sContent: If you really want a job as a graphic designer but work as a receptionist, you can spin a lot of your experience to make it relevant.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you really want a job as a graphic designer but work as a receptionist, you can spin a lot of your experience to make it relevant.
sentences.sCn: 如果你真的很想找一份图像设计师的工作，而你现在的工作却是接待员，你可以把你的很多经验都改造成相关经验。

words.tran: 被一般承认的；被认为标准的
接待；接收；招待会；感受；反应
接受能力；[生理] 感受性
收到；接受；迎接（receive的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: someone whose job is to welcome and deal with people arriving in a hotel or office building, visiting a doctor etc
